entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot run Microsoft.Web.LibraryManager.Cli tool with .NET 6/7 SDK's #24648
  • Bash completion function conflict with dotnet-suggest #24645

Closed

  • `dotnet sdk update` support #24461
  • error NETSDK1083: The specified RuntimeIdentifier 'ubuntu.22.04-x64' is not recognized when doing source building package for Ubuntu Jammy 22.04 #24425
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main sdk, .NET 6.0.2xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.2xx SDK #sdk-117260-.NET6.0.2xxSDK #22478
    Backlog
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK #sdk-115300-.NET6.0.1xxSDK #22192
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main .NET 5 SDK 5.0.2xx, validation-sdk-.NET 5 SDK 5.0.2xx, sdk #sdk-110982-.NET5SDK5.0.2xx #21399
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main sdk, .NET 5 SDK 5.0.4xx, validation-sdk-.NET 5 SDK 5.0.4xx #sdk-110573-.NET5SDK5.0.4xx #21343
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 7.0.1xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 7.0.1xx SDK #sdk-103310-.NET7.0.1xxSDK #19981
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main sdk, .NET 7.0.1xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 7.0.1xx SDK #sdk-102567-.NET7.0.1xxSDK #19862
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, .NET 6, validation-sdk-.NET 6, sdk #sdk-102308-.NET6 #19799

PullRequests

Created

  • Turn test back on. #24661
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Set TargetFrameworkMonikerDisplayName for .NET Standard and .NET Core/.NET5+ projects. #24656
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update ubuntu version #24650
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1693067 #24652
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding Package Validation support for cases where PackageId is different than AssemblyName #24439
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1691381 #24395
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Support installing workload pack groups #24630
  • Update the hardcoded net5.0 to the current framework #23881
    Area-Infrastructure
  • SDK integration via BundledNetCoreApp #24550
    Area-Infrastructure
